description: This file defines a mock class for the IStore2::INotification interface using Google Mock, which is used for testing components that depend on this notification interface within the WPEFramework project.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the IStore2::INotification interface for testing purposes.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method to simulate notification of value changes, capturing parameters such as scope, namespace, key, and value.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
